title: Biology Quiz
description: This quiz tests your knowledge on a range of biology topics from cell structure to genetics. You will be presented with 16 questions, some with one correct answer out of many and others with several correct answers out of many. Choose the answer(s) you think is/are correct, and for some questions, type your answer(s) in the text box. At the end of the quiz, you will receive your score along with the correct answers. Good luck!

questions.question: Which of the following is not a type of cell?
Which of the following is not a component of a nucleotide?
Which of the following is not a type of RNA?
Which of the following is not a type of connective tissue?
What is the function of the mitochondria?
Which of the following are functions of the Golgi apparatus?
Which of the following is not a type of muscle tissue?
What is the function of the endoplasmic reticulum?
